name: Media Factory Network
overview:
MFN is a network of content producers and brand marketers who have dedicated their careers to discovering, rethinking and refining the most effective way to capture the imagination of consumers.

Consumers expect on-demand, highly-targeted information that is rewarding, easy to understand and entertaining. We believe the most effective way to deliver that content is with short, engaging videos. And the best place to reach consumers is where they spend the bulk of their time: on the web, and on their mobile devices.

We are experienced, professional digital content specialists ready to work hand-in-hand with your team to concept, produce and distribute all of your digital and video content.
